## rxReadAuthoringContent() function

Reads the authoring content from a directory

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function rxReadAuthoringContent(aRoot: string, aTree: ReadDirectory): Observable<JsonEntryMap<AuthoringContentItem>>;
```
